CaseStudies.alt: Emma with her big sister, Addy.
CaseStudies.title: Emma's Hope
CaseStudies.excerpt: Running the gamut from sketching and ideation through marketing, print, collateral, and web for the charity started by my wife and I, in memory of our daughter, Emma.

CaseStudies.alt: Background pattern of low poly triangles.
CaseStudies.title: Incipia
CaseStudies.excerpt: I partnered with the team at Incipia to create an engaging digital presence, making their startup stand out among the competition.

CaseStudies.alt: Jared's custom red and brown guitar resting on a guitar stand.
CaseStudies.title: Jared Bracci
CaseStudies.excerpt: Jared is an eclectic artist, truly a man of many talents. He needed a website that captured his personality while showcasing his music.

CaseStudies.alt: The NICS website on an iPad with a pencil, flower, and stick next to it.
CaseStudies.title: NICS
CaseStudies.excerpt: The Network of International Christian Schools needed an updated website driven by user data to drive more traffic, and ultimately applicants.

CaseStudies.alt: The blue letter bible website on two iphones with a Bible in the background.
CaseStudies.title: Blue Letter Bible
CaseStudies.excerpt: Blue Letter Bible required an upgraded mobile experience for their website which provies a suite of Bible study tools for millions of users.

CaseStudies.alt: Erik Guzman, a contributor, smoking a pipe.
CaseStudies.title: Key Life
CaseStudies.excerpt: Key Life Network wanted to stand out among the crowd of ministry websites. They wanted a fresh website that was easy to navigate and use.

CaseStudies.alt: A gentleman wearing gloves serving food in the Bowery kitchen.
CaseStudies.title: The Bowery Mission
CaseStudies.excerpt: The Bowery Mission needed a refreshed and refocused website that would allow visitors to more easily and quickly understand who they are and drive donations.

CaseStudies.alt: Emma with her big sister, Addy.
CaseStudies.title: Mission Health Concepts
CaseStudies.excerpt: Mission Health Concepts was in desparate need of an updated website to bring their design and navigation into the twenty-first century.
